caption.p: A confocal micro-Raman analysis: ( a) the Raman spectra of NiO-0V and NiO-3V films; ( b) the Raman image of a discharged NiO film (integration time of 0.03 s); the colors in the spectra correspond to different areas in the Raman image using a filter for 278 cm âˆ’1; and ( c) the main Raman spectra associated with the two different colors.
